mapper.sql: hourflowlogid, orgid, branchid, deviceid, flowdate, flowhour, total, male, female, age1, age2, age3, age4, age5, createtime
mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(male),0) as male, ifnull(sum(female),0) as female, ifnull(sum(age1),0) as age1, ifnull(sum(age2),0) as age2, ifnull(sum(age3),0) as age3, ifnull(sum(age4),0) as age4, ifnull(sum(age5),0) as age5 from hourflowlog where deviceid = #{deviceid} and flowdate = #{day}

select ifnull(sum(male),0) as male, ifnull(sum(female),0) as female, ifnull(sum(age1),0) as age1, ifnull(sum(age2),0) as age2, ifnull(sum(age3),0) as age3, ifnull(sum(age4),0) as age4, ifnull(sum(age5),0) as age5 from hourflowlog where deviceid = #{deviceid} and left(flowdate,6) = #{month}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into hourflowlog (orgid, branchid, deviceid, flowdate, flowhour, total, male, female, age1, age2, age3, age4, age5, createtime ) values (#{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flowdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowhour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{male,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{female,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update hourflowlog
orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
branchid = #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deviceid = #{deviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flowdate = #{flowdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flowhour = #{flowhour,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER},
male = #{male,jdbcType=INTEGER},
female = #{female,jdbcType=INTEGER},
age1 = #{age1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
age2 = #{age2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
age3 = #{age3,jdbcType=INTEGER},
age4 = #{age4,jdbcType=INTEGER},
age5 = #{age5,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where hourflowlogid = #{hourflowlogid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update hourflowlog set orgid = #{orgid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, branchid = #{branchid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deviceid = #{deviceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flowdate = #{flowdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flowhour = #{flowhour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, male = #{male,jdbcType=INTEGER}, female = #{female,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age1 = #{age1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age2 = #{age2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age3 = #{age3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age4 = #{age4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age5 = #{age5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where hourflowlogid = #{hourflowlogid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
